The expert referred to a tweet made by S: James White, which stated that 10% of children in the United States are Texans.
The expert mentioned that State Rep: James White pointed to a 2016 report from the Center for Public Policy Priorities titled "State of Texas Children" as the source of his claim.
The expert compared White: s claim to a previous statement that "One in 10 babies born in this country is born in Texas," which was rated as True based on data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
The expert provided data from the Census: 4 million people under the age of 18 in Texas, which accounts for about 10% of the total population of people under 18 in the United States.
